summary.span: 針對按下 、 或 控制項時顯示 的控制項提供基本功能。

span.span: Provides basic functionality for controls that display a when a , , or control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是抽象的基底類別，如， ，和，它可以裝載項目直接或主應用程式下拉式清單的容器中的其他項目。 is the abstract base class for , , and , which can host items directly or host additional items in a drop-down container. 您可以設定屬性，以並設定屬性。You do this by setting the property to a and setting the property of the . 存取這些下拉式清單項目直接透過屬性。Access these drop-down items directly through the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何顯示和隱藏控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to show and hide controls. MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true 時，這個方法由任何 managed 物件持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 當覆寫小心不要參考先前處置好的呼叫中的物件。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需詳細資訊和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有相關聯，呼叫建立一般的下拉式清單控制項。If no is associated with the , a call to creates a generic drop-down control. > [!NOTE] > 如果自動產生的下拉式清單控制項，這表示項目會加入至集合，然後您將明確的下拉式清單控制項的屬性，您可能會遺失資料。If a drop-down control is automatically generated, which means that items are added to the collection, and you then set the property to an explicit drop-down control, you might lose data. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指派若要控制控制項的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to assign a control to a control's property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

param.name: m
param.span: 由參考所傳遞的 ，代表要處理的視窗訊息。

span.span: A , passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.

param.name: keyData
param.span: 其中一個 值，表示要處理的按鍵。

span.span: One of the values that represents the key to process.

summary.span: 處理命令按鍵。

span.span: Processes a command key.
in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在處理命令按鍵前置處理的訊息，會呼叫這個方法。This method is called during message preprocessing to handle command keys. 命令按鍵是一律優先於一般輸入按鍵的按鍵。Command keys are keys that always take precedence over regular input keys. 命令索引鍵的範例包括加速器和功能表的捷徑。Examples of command keys include accelerators and menu shortcuts. 此方法必須傳回`true`指出它已處理命令按鍵，或`false`表示索引鍵不 command 機碼。The method must return `true` to indicate that it has processed the command key, or `false` to indicate that the key is not a command key. 呼叫這個方法實作的中的項目是否集合。The implementation of this method calls the of the if there are items in the collection. 否則，此實作會呼叫基底類別實作。Otherwise, this implementation calls the base class implementation.

permission.span: 立即呼叫端和繼承類別呼叫這個方法。

span.span: for the immediate caller and inheriting classes to call this method.
Associated enumeration: .

para.span: 在覆寫衍生類別中的方法，此方法覆寫應該會傳回指出它已處理的索引鍵。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, the method override should return to indicate that it has processed the key.

para.span: 在衍生的類別很少，鮮，必須覆寫這個方法。

span.span: Derived classes will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.

summary.span: 處理對話方塊按鍵。

returns.span: 如果按鍵已由此項目處理則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the key was processed by the item; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在訊息前置處理向上、 向下、 左、 右、 ENTER 和空格鍵的索引鍵，才能瀏覽下拉式功能表的階層處理期間呼叫這個方法。This method is called during message preprocessing to handle the UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT, ENTER, and SPACEBAR keys in order to navigate the hierarchy of drop-down menus.

permission.span: 繼承類別呼叫這個方法的所有視窗。

span.span: for all windows for inheriting classes to call this method.

permission.span: 相關聯的列舉型別：的值。

span.span: Associated enumeration: value of .

para.span: 當覆寫方法在衍生類別中的覆寫的實作應該會傳回指出它已處理的索引鍵。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, the overriding implementation should return to indicate that it has processed the key.

para.span: 在衍生的類別很少，鮮，必須覆寫這個方法。

span.span: Derived classes will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以顯示已設定的下拉式清單控制項屬性。Use the method to display the drop-down controls that have been set by the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何顯示控制當按下按鈕時。The following code example demonstrates how to show a control when a button is pressed. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem/CS/Form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem/VB/Form1.vb#6)]
